core_requirements: Create, Read, Update, and Delete tasks
View all tasks in a list

localhost_implementation.architecture: Three-tier architecture with React frontend, Node.js/Express backend, and SQLite database
localhost_implementation.data_flow: Frontend makes API calls to backend, which interacts with SQLite database

implementation_plan: Set up React project with create-react-app
Create basic UI components for task list, task item, and task form
Set up Node.js/Express server with RESTful API endpoints
Implement SQLite database with tasks table
Connect backend to database and implement CRUD operations
assumptions: No need for advanced task properties (due dates, categories, etc.)
No need for user accounts or multiple users
No need for real-time updates or collaboration features
